premise_source_doc_sentence: Futurama is an American animated science fiction sitcom created by Matt Groening for the Fox Broadcasting Company .

premise_source_doc_sentence: The series follows the adventures of a late-20th-century New York City pizza delivery boy , Philip J. Fry , who , after being unwittingly cryogenically frozen for one thousand years , finds employment at Planet Express , an interplanetary delivery company in the retro-futuristic 31st century .
